entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
